subject: Darren W. Woods.
body:
Darren W. Woods.
Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
Exxon Mobil U.S.A
Attention: Beneficiary
This is to inform you that our company Exxon Mobil have instructed
HSBC BANK LONDON  to transfer your unpaid contract part payment fund
of $12.5m to you. This development was signed immediately after our
meeting with all the international organizations here in USA.
Further More kindly contact the International remittance Department
Name: DR ANDREW MAKINSON
Email: 
hsbcb372@gmail.com
Regards
Darren W. Woods.

subject: Re: Darren W. Woods.
body:
Hello Darren W. Woods,

Thank you for reaching out to me! It's quite a surprise to hear from the Chairman and CEO of Exxon Mobil. I'm curious, how did my name come up in your meeting? And could you please provide more details about this contract part payment fund? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michael
